## Matrix.getAllPositions() method

Return all value positions with the `x,y` coordinates in the matrix and thier `n` possition in the array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Matrix.Position](./matrix-scan.matrix.position.md)<!-- -->\[\]
